entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Solana Jump, Rest of Crypto Market Rises
entry.summary: Both Bitcoin and Solana cleared 11% gains over the past seven days, and Ethereum did nearly as well.

entry.title: Bitcoin ETF Issuers May Dwindle by End of Year, Says Valkyrie CIO
entry.summary: With such fierce competition in the field, Valkyrie’s CIO Steve McClurg predicts that not everyone will be left standing by next year.

entry.title: This Week in Crypto Games: ‘Pixels’ Airdrop Begins, ‘Shrapnel’ Kicks Off $100K Showdown
entry.summary: Catch up on this week’s crypto and NFT gaming news and find some weekend reads in our latest video game roundup.

entry.title: Why Treasure Is Building ‘Infinity Chains’ on Arbitrum to Power Ethereum Games
entry.summary: Despite offers from Optimism and others, the decentralized gaming ecosystem is doubling down on Arbitrum with its Treasure Chain.

entry.title: Gemini Advanced or ChatGPT Plus—Which One Should You Pay For?
entry.summary: Ignore the hype and choose the multimodal AI tool based on what really matters—how it can help streamline your workflow, or spare your wallet.

entry.title: You’re Never Going to Beat Twitter by Just Copying It, Says Farcaster Co-Founder
entry.summary: Dan Romero thinks Farcaster has a secret weapon no other upstart Twitter rival does. He and Base creator Jesse Pollak spoke with Decrypt.

entry.title: Major Token Unlocks Coming for Aptos, Sandbox, Avalanche and More in February
entry.summary: Crypto tokens worth hundreds of millions of dollars are set to flood onto the market this month for the first time.

entry.title: What Is ERC-404? The Experimental ‘Semi-Fungible’ Ethereum Token Standard
entry.summary: The experimental ERC-404 token standard combines elements of fungible and non-fungible tokens into a single "semi-fungible" digital asset.

entry.title: New York Wants $3 Billion From Digital Currency Group in Expanded Lawsuit
entry.summary: The original lawsuit wanted to get back $1 billion. Now, it's seeking $3 billion.

entry.title: 'Pixels' Airdrop Begins Ahead of Ronin Game's Token Launch
entry.summary: Crypto game Pixels is doling out airdrop allocations ahead of the PIXEL rollout—and just raised millions in funding too.

entry.title: Yuga Botched Another NFT Mint—Will the Bored Ape Maker Ditch Ethereum?
entry.summary: Another Otherside NFT mint has gone sour for Yuga Labs, leaving community members fed up and ready for change. Is "ApeChain" the answer?

entry.title: As Bitcoin Price Soars, These On-Chain Signals Are Flashing Bullish: Glassnode
entry.summary: From investor profits to network security, a collection of key on-chain indicators look strong for the orange coin.

entry.title: ‘Mystery Society’ Puts an NFT Twist on Casual Party Games Like ‘Among Us’
entry.summary: Led by a Club Penguin vet, studio Great Big Beautiful Tomorrow has raised $3 million to build crypto games—starting with The Mystery Society.

entry.summary: DFZ Labs incubated Bits, which will launch 10,000 Bitcoin Ordinals via Magic Eden and develop a game that holders can contribute to.

entry.summary: The Black Mirror 'Smile Club' challenges participants to smile to earn points, competing on a leaderboard to win prizes.

entry.summary: Altman is said to want to use the staggering amount of funding to increase global chip production, sources told The Wall Street Journal.

entry.summary: In her annual report, the U.S. Treasury Secretary asked Congress to close "holes" in federal digital asset regulations.

entry.title: Binance Co-Founder Offers $10,000 Bounties to Employees Who Report Leaks
entry.summary: Binance co-founder Yi He is offering $10,000 bounties to employees who report colleagues involved in insider trading or leaks.

entry.title: Bitcoin Tops $46,000, Analysts Predict More Gains Before Halving
entry.summary: BTC soared past the $46,000 price point early on Friday morning, as analysts predict more bullish momentum ahead of the Bitcoin halving.

entry.summary: Over 200 companies and industry leaders have formed the U.S. AI Safety Institute to ensure AI innovation doesn't compromise safety.

entry.summary: Whether years or decades away, a new coalition is preparing for a post-quantum world.

entry.summary: Community Gaming, a blockchain-based esports tournament platform, is integrating Worldcoin’s World ID to weed out cheaters.

entry.summary: A new Gemini Advanced plan is here, bringing pressure to bear on first-mover ChatGPT Plus: Both offer advanced multimodal capabilities for the same price.

entry.summary: The anticipated Dencun update will greatly improve the speed and affordability of transactions on Ethereum’s layer-2 networks.

entry.summary: Gameplay footage from the STX1 early access gameplay demo of Shrapnel, a first-person shooter built on Avalanche.

entry.title: Ethereum Staking Booms, With 25% of All ETH Locked Up
entry.summary: A quarter of all Ethereum in circulation—nearly $75 billion worth of coins—is now being pledged to the network through staking, data shows.

entry.title: FCC Bans Robocalls Using AI-Generated Voices As Deepfake Worries Deepen
entry.summary: After an AI deepfake of President Joe Biden targeted New Hampshire voters last month, the federal agency is taking action ahead of the 2024 U.S. elections.

entry.title: 'Pixels' Token Launch Date Set as Binance Reveals PIXEL Staking Rewards
entry.summary: Binance Launchpool will offer up 350 million PIXEL as staking rewards before the Ronin gaming token goes live this month.

entry.summary: Ethereum layer-2 scaling solution Blast sets itself apart with features including native yields for ETH and stablecoins.

entry.title: Farcaster: Has Decentralized Social Media Finally Arrived?
entry.summary: Rug Radio creator Benjamin White digs into the rise of Farcaster, the decentralized social media platform that's challenging Twitter following the launch of its Frames feature. Is this the decentralized social media app that finally clicks with the masses?

entry.title: Why Gmoney Took Out a $1 Million Loan on a CryptoPunks NFT
entry.summary: Pseudonymous NFT collector and entrepreneur Gmoney joined Rug Radio's live "FOMO Hour" show to discuss why he took out a $1 million loan on one of the most recognizable CryptoPunks NFTs around.

entry.title: Solana Hunger Games: Explained in One Minute or Less
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains the latest sensation taking over timelines on Crypto Twitter, Solana Hunger Games. The new "crypto AR" game from GG.zip is backed by Delphi and plans to launch in the spring. Here's what going on, explained in one minute or less.

entry.title: 5 Questions With SCENE: Gala Marija Vrbanic
entry.summary:
Tribute Brand founder and CEO Gala Marija Vrbanic joins 5 Questions With SCENE to discuss not just fashion, but graffiti crimes, fishless aquariums, and the apparently emergent sport of wind chasing.
Video shot and edited by Vincent Roazzi Jr.

entry.title: Why Is Everyone Talking About Jupiter on Solana?
entry.summary: Rug Radio Creator and crypto influencer AshleyDCan explains why the crypto world can't stop talking about Solana's Jupiter. What is JUP? Who qualified for the airdrop? And will there be another round?

entry.title: Jupiter Founder Meow Unloads on the Solana Airdrop 'FUD'
entry.summary: Meow, the pseudonymous founder of Solana DEX aggregator Jupiter, made a surprise appearance today on Rug Radio's "FOMO Hour" to address the JUP airdrop "FUD," and explain why he believes the backlash to the team's launch liquidity pool is unfounded.

entry.title: The Future is Multichain w/ Jason Trikakis from Holograph
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Jason from Holograph.xyz
They dive into the multichain future and what that means for NFTs, DeFi, RWAs, and more.

entry.title: How Generative AI Makes for a More Inclusive Metaverse in 'Avalon'
entry.summary: Avalon Chief Product Officer Jeffrey Butler speaks with Decrypt reporter Jason Nelson about the use of generative AI within the upcoming game and how it will help players from anywhere and everywhere truly see themselves represented in the online world.

entry.title: How a Perfume DAO Crafted a 'Scent of the Metaverse'
entry.summary: Rook Perfumes founder Nadeem Crowe and Melissa Gilmour of Web3 creative agency Lily & Piper join Stephen Graves to talk about how they created a fragrance with a DAO and brought it to the shelves of London department store Harvey Nichols.

entry.title: Trash-Fueled BTC Mining w/ Chris Bennet
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Chris Bennet from Spacestation Investments.
They discuss: - Mining BTC with energy generated from landfills - How to increase deal-flow - Running an agency vs running a fund

entry.title: Preview of Agoria's 'Le Code d’Orsay'
entry.summary: A first look at "Sigma Lumina," a sculpture by artist and musician Agoria in collaboration with Johan Lescure. It features in "Le Code d’Orsay," the first NFT exhibition at the Musée d’Orsay.

entry.title: Are you the one being farmed? w/ Frisson
entry.summary:
Reza is joined by Frisson from Tallyx.xyz
They reflect on: - building in the bear market - the points system meta - will zoomers care about decentralization

entry.title: 'Look Touch Own': OONA Discusses Her Performance Art Exhibition
entry.summary: Conceptual artist OONA joins moderator Raina Marie to discuss "Look Touch Own," her performance art exhibition featuring her own former breast implants, which have been tokenized. This conversation was recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.

entry.title: Genius Marketing by Genius Marketers: How Crypto Builders Can Reach the Masses
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh Sarmad moderates a conversation between 9dcc founder and CEO Gmoney and Serotonin founder and CEO Amanda Cassatt about the challenges and opportunities in Web3 marketing and how they're navigating the ever-evolving space. Recorded at Rug Radio's R Haus event at Art Basel Miami in December 2023.
